mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (nickname, password, phone_num, email, avatarUrl, create_time, update_time, is_deleted) VALUES (#{nickname}, #{password}, #{phoneNum}, #{email}, #{avatarUrl}, NOW(), NOW(), 0)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user WHERE email = #{email} AND is_deleted = 0
SELECT * FROM user WHERE phone_num = #{phone} AND is_deleted = 0
SELECT * FROM user WHERE (nickname = #{account} OR email = #{account} OR phone_num = #{account}) AND is_deleted = 0
SELECT * FROM user WHERE (nickname = #{nickname}) AND is_deleted = 0
